messages.content: Can you make a string of text that will let me search my Gmail for an email from bob@gmail.com and also has a PDF and a word document attached. What is the exact keyword that I should place in the search box to find this?

To search your Gmail for an email from "bob@gmail.com" that includes both a PDF and a Word document as attachments, you can use the following search query in the Gmail search box:

```
from:bob@gmail.com has:attachment filename:pdf filename:docx
```

This query specifies that the email must be from "bob@gmail.com", must have attachments, and specifically includes files with the ".pdf" and ".docx" extensions, which are common for PDFs and Word documents, respectively.
